references.reason: This book is a foundational text in causal inference, providing the theoretical basis for many concepts used in the paper.

references.paper_title: Elements of causal inference: Foundations and learning algorithms
references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of causal inference methods, including many techniques relevant to the paper's approach.
This paper introduces the concept of causal abstraction, which is central to the methodology developed in the paper.
This paper extends the concept of causal abstraction to handle uncertainty and approximation, which is crucial for practical application of the methods in the paper.

references.paper_title: Latent ordinary differential equations for irregularly-sampled time series
references.reason: This paper introduces latent ODEs which are employed in the paper as a model of the underlying dynamics.
